ModMetaData.name: Winter Taiga Biome
ModMetaData.author: Reel
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a unique vanilla-friendly Permanent Winter Forest biome with unique Trees, Bushes and other flora that changes appearance between Summer to Winter.
The Winter Wonderland of your dreams begins here!
Winter Taiga description - Forests of coniferous snowy trees surrounded by snow and small patches of freezing soil. Bordering between Boreal Forests and Tundras and enveloped within a harsh permanent winter, winter taigas sustain a diverse population of small and large animals and their trees don't lose their leaves.
[BiomesKit required] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2153006237 Your game will not work without the mod listed above. New save file required. Might cause issues removing mid-save.
